definitions.definition: A person dedicated to a life of religion or monasticism , especially a member of an order without religious vows or a lay member of a religious community.
A child given up by its parents into the keeping or dedication of a religious order or house.

main_definition: ( Roman Catholicism ) A person dedicated to a life of religion or monasticism , especially a member of an order without religious vows or a lay member of a religious community.
secondary_definitions: A child given up by its parents into the keeping or dedication of a religious order or house.
